function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of COVID-19 in warmer climates","Impact":"Increased risk of widespread COVID-19 transmission in locations with warmer climates","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures regardless of climate, conduct further research to understand the virus behavior in different climates","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Population in warmer climates","Owner":"Public health authorities and research institutions"},{"Description":"HVAC system potentially contributing to airborne pathogen transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within buildings","Mitigation":"Conduct robust, interventional studies on HVAC systems, implement improved air filtration and ventilation systems","Technologies":"Improved air filtration and ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers","Owner":"Building management, healthcare facilities"},{"Description":"Presence of SARS-CoV-2 in air and on surfaces in healthcare environments","Impact":"Increased risk of healthcare-associated transmission of SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Implement strict infection control measures, improve ventilation and air filtration in healthcare facilities","Technologies":"Improved ventilation and air filtration systems, strict infection control measures","People":"Healthcare workers, patients","Owner":"Healthcare facilities"}]}
